https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yTga3Fi3msrZpRzue2Y64DESwDj.jpg A 25-minute animated film without words based on the picture book by Peter Collington. The traditional nativity characters feature in the story but the setting is contemporary and the plot, touching and original. A Small Miracle
